title: M3GAN 2.0
writer: Gerard Johnstone, Akela Cooper, James Wan
actors: Allison Williams, Violet McGraw, Amie Donald
plot: Two years after M3GAN's rampage, her creator, Gemma, resorts to resurrecting her infamous creation in order to take down Amelia, the military-grade weapon who was built by a defense contractor who stole M3GAN's underlying tech.
